settings.heading: Delivery
settings.content: Complimentary Express Shipping on all orders. Shipped via DHL Express

Complimentary Express Shipping
Handmade in Italy from Italian Leather
Free Returns

Shipping cost is based on weight. Just add products to your cart and use the Shipping Calculator to see the shipping price.

We want you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. Items can be returned or exchanged within 30 days of delivery.

settings.title: For the Smart Modern Woman
settings.text:
The Bella bag seamlessly shifts from an elegant tote to a practical backpack, blending luxury with versatility to match even the most dynamic lifestyle. Designed to be both fashionable yet convenient, the Bella bag is spacious and comes with wide straps that are comfortable to wear for long periods. It's the ideal choice for the cosmopolitan woman, active mother or traveler and is the perfect fit for the smart modern woman.

Easy Backpack/Tote Conversion
Spacious Enough To Fit Everything You Need
Fits A Laptop (Bella fits 13 inch, Bella XL fits 16 inch)
Wide, Comfortable Straps
Handmade With Genuine Italian Leather

settings.content: All VESTIRSI bags are handmade in Italy, the birth place of the worlds finest leather. While we are an Australian brand, our heritage is deeply tied to Italy and we are proud to partner with the best Italian artisans to handcraft all VESTIRSI Italian leather bags.

All the details you love about the original—with a fresh flared block heel and modern square toe. Expertly crafted using soft Nappa leather, this essential style molds and moves with you to keep you comfortably on your feet all day (and night). This boot uses leather sourced from a Leather Working Group-approved trader. The Leather Working Group (LWG) Audit Standards provide transparency and accountability within the leather supply chain—covering energy and water usage.
